string.value: You're really starting to look like a Warrior now. #b#p1022000##k wants to give you a final training session.
#p1022000# wants you to hunt #r15 #o1110101#s#k. #o1110101#s look like #o0130100#s but are way stronger. You should stay on your guard.\n\n#o1110101# #r#a21311##k
Youe wiped out 15 #o1110101#s. Thanks to #p1022000# , you're well on your path of becoming a true Warrior.
어린 전사 형제여. 지금까지 수련을 잘 따라와 주었네. 부족하되, 이제는 어느 정도 틀을 갖춘 자네의 모습이 보이는군. 정말 기쁘네. 자신만만한 자네의 눈빛을 보니 지금까지의 수련을 시험해 보아도 되겠군.
다크 스텀프 15마리를 사냥해 보게. 그것은 스텀프와 유사하게 생겼지만 그보다는 훨씬 강한 몬스터이지. 사냥할 때 긴장을 풀어서는 안 될 것이네. 하지만 걱정은 말게. 자네가 지금까지 수련을 열심히 했다면 그리 어렵지 않은 상대일 것이니.
시험이 두려운 건가? 두려워하지 말게. 자네는 이미 한 명의 전사이니.
Young Warrior! You've been trained well. Now, though you need more training, you are ready to become a Warrior. I'm really happy. I can see confidence in your eyes. Let me test you now!
Hunt for #rfifteen #o1110101#s#k, which looks like #o0130100#s but are much stronger. Be alert when you hunt, but don't worry; you can handle them if you trained enough.
Are you afraid of the test? Please don't. You are already a Warrior.
Young Warrior! You hunted 15 #o1110101#. I knew you could made it. Fantastic. I shouldn't say you're young from now on. Someone that improved a lot in such a short time has great potential!
You just began to be a Warrior. You have a long way to go. It definitely is hard but I want you to face it and fight. That's what Warriors are meant to be.
You haven't hunted #rfifteen#o1110101# #k. Get out there and do it!
